entry.title: [GRA6][Virtual Private Servers] - Incident notification
entry.content:
Dec 18, 06:44 UTC
Identified - An incident is in progress on our Virtual Private Servers offer. It has temporarily affected the availability.

Here is detail for this incident :

Start time : 18/12/2024 02:35 UTC
Service impact : you might experience issue with VPS in GRA6 region.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams have identified the root cause and are working on resolving the incident.
Root cause : The storage infrastructure for GRA6 region got a software malfunction.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

Our teams are fully mobilized and actively working to resolve this problem.

We will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.
We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [SBG3][Dedicated Servers] - Rack S323A03 / S345B07
entry.content:
Dec 16, 10:43 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.
All services are operational. There has been no impact since 16/12/2024 10:36 UTC.

Dec 16, 08:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Nov 27, 09:53 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 16/12/2024 08:00 UTC
End time : 16/12/2024 11:00 UTC
Service impact : Each server in rack S323A03 / S345B07 will be unreachable for 30 minutes during the maintenance
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, our teams will move servers from rack S323A03 to S322A06 and S345B07 to S345B08.

Thank you for your understanding.
